name: flutter-upload-testflight
description: Upload AAB file to TestFlight using fastlane. Using command `fastlane pilot upload`.
helpMarkDown: Uplaod fastlane to TestFlight. Required data for the task: IPA file, p8 key file, Key ID, Issuer ID, Team ID. p8 can be created in the Apple Developer Portal. Link to the Keys section: https://developer.apple.com/account/resources/authkeys/list. Link to the Membership section: https://developer.apple.com/account/#/membership
author: Andrii Petrovskyi

inputs.name: ipaFile
inputs.label: IPA file
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to the IPA file to upload.

inputs.name: keyFile
inputs.label: p8 key file
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to the p8 key file. The key file is used to authenticate with the Apple Developer Portal.

inputs.name: keyId
inputs.label: Key ID
inputs.helpMarkDown: Key ID from the Apple Developer Portal. Can be found in the Keys section. Link to the Keys section: https://developer.apple.com/account/resources/authkeys/list

inputs.name: issuerId
inputs.label: issuerId
inputs.helpMarkDown: Issuer ID from the Apple Developer Portal. Can be found in the Keys section. Link to the Keys section: https://developer.apple.com/account/resources/authkeys/list

inputs.name: teamId
inputs.label: Team ID
inputs.helpMarkDown: Team ID from the Apple Developer Portal. Can be found in the Membership section. Link to the Membership section: https://developer.apple.com/account/#/membership

inputs.name: duration
inputs.label: Duration
inputs.helpMarkDown: The time in seconds that the uploaded build will be active. Default is 500 seconds. Using for the command `fastlane pilot upload`. Can be read more about the command here: https://docs.fastlane.tools/actions/pilot/

inputs.name: waitProcessing
inputs.label: Wait until App Store processing is finished
inputs.helpMarkDown: Wait until App Store processing is finished. Using for the command `fastlane pilot upload`. Can be read more about the command here: https://docs.fastlane.tools/actions/pilot/
